replies.body: This "sometimes drops items" rule for the PvE rounds feels really crappy ingame, being denied items puts you at such a huge disadvantage that it feels worthless playing when you constantly don't get items.
I feel an item a minion is a bit much. Maybe an item every 2 minions for all
That's if you even get an item at all

at least 1 item per PvE
twice i didnt get a single item :(
and some times i got 3 (only once so far)
I agree, I feel like to be fair every creep you kill should grant you an item. That way youre not possibly left out and behind from maybe a couple of people getting items while the rest dont.
